summary: Update the sports-officials provider website with refreshed branding, add SwiftSport logo assets, and enhance marketing/lead-capture (contact info + chatbot) to attract and collect referee requirements.
imageRequirements:

existing_features.title: Add the SwiftSport logo as a static frontend asset and apply it consistently across the site (e.g., top navigation/header, footer, and browser tab favicon where applicable).
Refresh the sports officials provider website content and layout to reflect updated branding, with all user-facing text in English.

Implement a coherent visual theme for the refreshed site (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) that aligns with a modern sports brand aesthetic, and apply it consistently across all pages/sections. Avoid a blue+purple default palette unless required by existing brand assets.

Update all displayed and linked contact details across the site to use email swiftsports1512@gmail.com and phone number 8431680623 (including mailto: and tel: links, copy-to-clipboard values, and any prefilled email actions).

Add an on-site chatbot-style lead-capture UI that collects sports referee requirements (e.g., sport, number of referees/officials needed, date/time, location, competition level, and requester contact details) and allows the user to submit the request.
Strengthen site marketing copy (headlines, subheadlines, service descriptions, and CTAs) to be more conversion-focused and attention-grabbing while staying accurate for a sports officials provider.
Add attention-grabbing marketing images to the landing page and integrate them as static assets (not served from the backend), ensuring they match the existing SwiftSport branding and overall theme.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add the SwiftSport logo to the sports-officials provider website and refresh/update the site to match new branding.
Add contact details to the site: email swiftsports1512@gmail.com and phone number 8431680623.
Add a chatbot to capture/collect the required sports referees (lead capture form via chat).
Add strong marketing lines and attention-grabbing images across the site to improve appeal and conversions.

Persist submitted chatbot lead-capture requests in the Motoko backend so they are not lost on refresh, and expose backend methods to create and list submitted requests for internal verification/testing.
